id: The Great, and even Legendary, Charlie Kirk, is dead. No one understood or had the Heart of the Yout
text: The Great, and even Legendary, Charlie Kirk, is dead. No one understood or had the Heart of the Youth in the United States of America better than Charlie. He was loved and admired by ALL, especially me, and now, he is no longer with us. Melania and my Sympathies go out to his

id: In honor of Charlie Kirk, a truly Great American Patriot, I am ordering all American Flags throughou
text:
In honor of Charlie Kirk, a truly Great American Patriot, I am ordering all American Flags throughout the United States lowered to Half Mast until Sunday evening at 6 P.M.

(TS: 10 Sep 17:02 ET)​​​‍​​‌‍​​‌‍​​​​​​‌‍​​‌‍​​​​​​​​​‌‍​​​‌‍​‌‍​​‌‍​​​​​​​​​​‌‍​​​‌‍​​​​​​​‌‍​​​​​​​‌‍

id: Brazil is doing a terrible thing on their treatment of former President Jair Bolsonaro. I have watch
text: Brazil is doing a terrible thing on their treatment of former President Jair Bolsonaro. I have watched, as has the World, as they have done nothing but come after him, day after day, night after night, month after month, year after year! He is not guilty of anything, except

id: The ANIMAL who so violently killed the beautiful young lady from Ukraine, who came to America search
text:
The ANIMAL who so violently killed the beautiful young lady from Ukraine, who came to America searching for peace and safety, should be given a “Quick” (there is no doubt!) Trial, and only awarded THE DEATH PENALTY. There can be no other option!!! PRESIDENT DONALD J. TRUMP
